--- Part 1 ---

```{r}
`%AND%` <- bitwAnd
`%OR%` <- bitwOr
# `%NOT%` <- bitwNot
`%XOR%` <- bitwXor
`%LSHIFT%` <- bitwShiftL
`%RSHIFT%` <- bitwShiftR

operators <- c("AND","OR","XOR","LSHIFT","RSHIFT")

for( i in operators){
  input <- stringr::str_replace_all(input, paste0(" ",i," "), paste0(" %",i,"% "))
}

input <- stringr::str_replace_all(input, "NOT (.+) \\-\\> (.+)", "bitwNot(\\1) -> \\2")  

input <- input |> stringr::str_replace_all("if","IF") |> stringr::str_replace_all("in", "IN")



eval(parse(text = input))

```
